System overview: An autonomous shuttle transports passengers on a fixed downtown loop.
Objectives: maintain safe headway, stop accurately at stations, and avoid collisions with pedestrians.
Operating environment: mixed traffic, day/night, light rain, and occasional road closures.
Actors: safety driver, remote supervisor, and maintenance technician.
Scope: onboard control software, sensors, braking, and steering; out of scope is city traffic control.
Assumptions: road markings are visible and a remote operator is available during service hours.
